alert.note: Alert for Dent; Shannon; Texas (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 21 at 3:55AM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Shannon, south central Dent and southeastern Texas Counties through 445 AM CDT... At 355 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Raymondville, or 8 miles southeast of Houston, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Current River State Park... Ozark National Scenic Riverways... Echo Bluff State Park... Montauk State Park... Houston... Eminence... Summersville... Raymondville... Montauk... Turtle... Jadwin... Arroll... Gladden... Eunice... Alley Spring... Yukon... Hartshorn... Clear Springs... Round Spring... West Eminence... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
